author: termina1
content:
Hi, I'm implementing proxy for load balancing of JSON RPC and I have 2 questions, may be someone can help me:
1. Do I understand correctly, that subscriptions are currently not a part of any spec? Is there an EIP somewhere?
2. Is there any way for server to terminate a subscription without terminating full WS connection? Because I didn't find anywhere a description of the message that could do that, if there is one can you point me towards it?

author: termina1
content: Hi I m implementing proxy for load
